arts.ttl: Balotelli almost scores first goal for Genoa but Napoli holds on to lead Serie A again
arts.sum: It was one of several decisive saves by Meret in the second half as Genoa came out fighting after going into the break two goals down following headers from Frank Anguissa and Amir Rrahmani. Mario Balotelli almost scored his first goal back in Serie A while Napoli returned to the top after withstanding a late siege from Genoa to hold on for a 2-1 win on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Napoli interested in Maguire - Sunday's gossip
arts.sum: Napoli interested in Harry Maguire, Randal Kolo Muani a target for several Premier League teams, Christopher Nkunku ready to leave Chelsea, plus more.

arts.ttl: Napoli’s Conte on victory over Genoa: “A second half to forget’
arts.sum: Napoli manager Antonio Conte analyzed their 2-1 victory against Genoa in an interview with Dazn, sharing his frustration with the performance, despite their victory. The post Napoli’s Conte on victory over Genoa: “A second half to forget’ appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Genoa 1-2 Napoli: Match Report
arts.sum: In a thrilling Serie A encounter at Luigi Ferraris stadium, Napoli secured a hard-fought 2-1 win against Genoa, handing Patrick Vieira his first defeat since taking over as manager. The match was a rollercoaster of near misses, spectacular saves, and crucial moments that kept fans on the edge of their seats. The post Serie A | Genoa 1-2 Napoli: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.
